title: Media Publications Disclosure Act
context: [CHAPTER 480B] MEDIA PUBLICATIONS DISCLOSURE ACT Section 480B-1 General definitions 480B-2 Disclosure 480B-3 Annual report Case Notes Act 243 [L 1995] preempted by Newspaper Preservation Act, because Act 243 intruded upon a field preempted by Congress; plaintiffs&rsquo; preemption claim was ripe. 103 F.3d 742.
